divs: sighting details10 or more orange\red orbs\balls of light flying in formation changing directions and forming patterns like triangles i also seen what looked like to me the big dipper in one of the formations. there were about ten other people with me at the time all of us seen the same thing.i lasted about 20-30 minutes.
